document_data.mainbody:
irva was a cloud giant on a quest sometime after the War of the Silver Marches.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, after the disappearance of King Hekaton, Nirva and sibling Jaral went on a quest in order to place the cloud giant stripe (and themselves) at the top of the renewed ordning. They followed a legend and found pieces of a fallen cloud giants castle in the High Moor. Nirva and Jaral went to Secomber in order to find more about regional history in order to find the exact resting place of the castle.
